title: Craziest Lamborghinis in Japan on Lexani Forged Wheels
description: From Tokyo to Yokohoma and Chiba, get a look at the most outrageous Lambos rolling on forged Lexani rims - The 2015 Lexani Japan Tour.

asset.title: Craziest Lamborghinis in Japan on Lexani Forged Wheels
